verbs_Auxiliary_Verbs_key2: Auxiliary verbs ke baare me jaanne ke liye yeh video dekhein.
verbs_Auxiliary_Verbs_key4: TO BE, TO HAVE and TO DO are the three primary auxiliary verbs in English.
verbs_Auxiliary_Verbs_key5: TO BE has the following forms: Am, is, are, was, were, being, been
verbs_Auxiliary_Verbs_key6: TO HAVE has the following forms: Have, has, had, having
verbs_Auxiliary_Verbs_key7: TO DO has the following forms: Do, does, did, doing, done
verbs_Auxiliary_Verbs_key9: Fill in the blanks with the correct forms of Primary Auxiliary Verbs:
verbs_Auxiliary_Verbs_key10: You must come to my house after you _ completed your work.
verbs_Auxiliary_Verbs_key12: _ he say where he came from?
verbs_Auxiliary_Verbs_key13: There ___ many things which the man ___ not know.
verbs_Auxiliary_Verbs_key14: The foreman ___ made the call to Gopal after the man came.
verbs_Auxiliary_Verbs_key15: The manager __ a decent man because he helps others.
verbs_Auxiliary_Verbs_key16: There _ several episodes about which I must tell you.
verbs_Auxiliary_Verbs_key17: He ___ (not) want to share his secret with the officer.
verbs_Auxiliary_Verbs_key18: The man __ a plan for the revolution.
